title: Prince of palms
creator_credit: Malayan Film Unit and A Peter Amavasi
brief_description: An account of Malaya’s third largest industry. The coconut palm is grown as a crop mainly for the extraction of oil from its nut, but it is put to a variety of other uses, ranging from rope-making from its fibre to the carving of ornamental containers from the shell.
creator_credit_for_label: Malayan Film Unit and A Peter Amavasi
